title: Friends list deleted
body:
So i just logged on and entire friends list is deleted.. Same with my friends. Anyone else having this issue, and will it get fixed? 

There is no way Ill remember everyone to re add :|

replies.body:
happen to me since few weeks ago. 
i think with time it would fix, but no...
Is there anything i can do or is a matter of time?

**Mindstar **has posted an announcement here in case your issue is still ongoing:
http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/announcements/B41QTqBZ-1542016-friends-list-chat-issues

> **_UPDATE 22:30_
> We've made some fixes to our servers that should hopefully resolve the issue. Let us know if it is fixed!**
> 
> Original Post
> 
> Hi folks,
> 
> We're aware of some issues with the chat system which are causing player's friends lists to not display correctly or at all.
> 
> We're working on it now so stay tuned for updates.
> 
> Cheers
> Mindstar
Lost all my friends :'( slightly less panicked now that I know it's on Riot's end. Hope they fix it soon, there'll be plenty of league-only friends who want to play poro king tonight.
This has happened to 2 of my friends aswell.
